headline: Stephen Colbert Tells Mehmet Oz Exactly Where To Stick His Senate Campaign
author: Lee Moran
sentences: Stephen Colbert mocked Republican Mehmet Oz’s run for senator of Pennsylvania, given the celebrity physician’s “tenuous” links to the state and his reported underperforming in straw polls on the race.
On Friday, “The Late Show” host Colbert unveiled a spoof campaign billboard for the Senate hopeful, who is also known as Dr. Oz.

Advertisement
The comedian then gave Oz a very tough pill to swallow.
